summary: This is an email from August 10, 2019, regarding the creation of a weekly briefing sheet (SCN) on the Epstein case. It instructs recipients to provide updates on a 'Death Investigation' section and other aspects of the case for inclusion in a weekly Suspicious Activity Report (SAR).

events.title: Weekly Epstein Case Briefing Initiated
events.description: An email is sent instructing team members to begin providing weekly updates for a briefing sheet (SCN) on the Epstein case, including a new 'Death Investigation' section.

keyFacts: A weekly briefing sheet (SCN) on the Epstein case was being created as of August 10, 2019, to be submitted with a weekly Suspicious Activity Report (SAR).
The briefing was to cover all aspects of the case including financial, victims, forfeiture, and PC (likely 'Probable Cause' or another legal term).
A specific 'Death Investigation' section was to be added and populated weekly, indicating an active investigation into Epstein's death at that time.
The communication shows a structured, ongoing investigative and reporting process within an organization (likely law enforcement or a financial institution) following Epstein's arrest and death.
